vc.prottype: FWLIBAPI short WINAPI cnc_wrcountr(unsigned short FlibHndl,short length,IDBWRC *wrcount);

cmn.p: Writes the tool life counter within the specified tool group range.
The unit of the tool life counter is either [minute] or [count]. The parameter LTM(Series 15/15i:7400#3, Series 16/18/21, 16i/18i/21i, 0i, 30i:6800#2) determines which unit is used.
The maximum number of the tool life counter is the following.

tr.td: 999999 counts(in case of the tool life management B)
100000 minutes(in case of the tool life management B)
99999999 counts(in case of the tool life management B)
100000 minutes(in case of the tool life management B)
(When life count interval is 0.1 seconds, the max. value is 60,000 minutes.)

cmn.p: Writes the tool life counter within the specified tool group range.
The unit of the tool life counter is either [minute] or [count]. The parameter LTM(6800#2) determines which unit is used.
The maximum number of the tool life counter is the following.

tr.td: 99999999 counts(in case of the tool life management B)
100000 minutes(in case of the tool life management B)
(When life count interval is 0.1 seconds, the max. value is 60,000 minutes.)

content.p: Specify the library handle. See "Library handle" for details.

Specify the length of the data block(size of IDBWRC structure)
IDBWRC
N is number of the tool group to be written.

item.name: EW_LENGTH
item.content:
data block length error
Size of IDBWRC structure(length) is wrong.

item.name: EW_NUMBER
item.content:
data number error
The specification of tool group number (datano_s,datano_e) is wrong.

item.name: EW_DATA
item.content:
data error(30i only)
Tool life counter(count) is out of range.

item.name: EW_NOOPT
item.content:
no option
The tool life management function is necessary.

hssb.p: The extended driver/library function are necessary.

ethr.p: The Ethernet function and the extended driver/library function are necessary.
However, in case of Series 16i/18i/21i-B, 0i-B/C/D and 30i the required CNC option is as follows.

p.ul: above two optional functions are not required.

option.need:
Series 15/15i, 16/18/21/21i, 0i, 30i The tool life management function.
Series 16i/18i The tool life management function or the tool life management B function.

type.li:
Series 15/15i
This function is influenced by 1024/512 pairs of the tool life management.

Series 16/18/21, 16i/18i/21i
This function is influenced by 512(M Series)/128(T Series) pairs of the tool life management.

Series 30i
This function is influenced by additional pairs number of the tool life management.
the tool life management :256 pairs of the tool life management on whole system, both of M and T Series
additional pairs number of the tool life management:1024 pairs of the tool life management on whole system, both of M and T Series

hssb.p: The tool life management function and the extended driver/library function are necessary.
And this function is influenced by additional pairs number of the tool life management.

tr.td: 256 pairs of the tool life management on whole system, both of M and T Series
additional pairs number of the tool life management
1024 pairs of the tool life management on whole system, both of M and T Series
